snippet.title: "Hatsune Miku Connecting Puzzle TAMAGOTORI"Introduction
snippet.description:
"Hatsune Miku Connecting Puzzle TAMAGOTORI"
A brand new Hatsune Miku puzzle game comes to the Nintendo Switch!
Connect eggs to clear and solve puzzles!
Collect as many birds and cute illustrations as you can with Miku and her friends!

Connect eggs with the same patterns with a line that bends twice or less to clear them. Clear all the eggs to complete the stage!

Look across the entire board to find eggs to clear!

■Title: Hatsune Miku Connecting Puzzle TAMAGOTORI
■Release date: January 27th, 2022 (Thursday)
■Genre: Puzzle
■Supported hardware: Nintendo Switch
■Number of players: 1
■Suggested retail price: 1,500 yen
■Purchasing method: Nintendo eShop (download-only software)
■Twitter：https://twitter.com/cfm_mobile
